data.name: Spirit Swap: Lofi Beats to Match-3 To
data.detailed_description:
• Swap to the beat as you reassemble lost spirits, and enjoy a custom lofi soundtrack by the incredible Meltycanon.
  • Cast powerful spells. Arrange spirits into special patterns to unlock potent powers!
  • Bond with a cast of witches and demons. Plan a pizza party together, crash a concert, maybe even smooch!
  • Decorate your bedroom. Earn trinkets and keepsakes as you play, then place them in Samar’s room to affect gameplay.
  • Compete in local VS mode! Everything is chill, until it gets permanently unchill....
  • Enjoy over 5 unique game modes, including Time Attack, Score Attack, and Survival.





Samar is a young witch working the spirit-swapping night shift in the eastern outskirts of Demashq. A recent spike in spirits crossing over from another dimension breaks the chill atmosphere of their night shift. With her trusty familiarZ by her side, she sets off into the city to find out what’s happened. With a popular band scheduled to kick off their big comeback tour in Demashq, Samar needs to work quickly before the city is overrun with stans and spirits alike!
data.about_the_game:
• Swap to the beat as you reassemble lost spirits, and enjoy a custom lofi soundtrack by the incredible Meltycanon.
  • Cast powerful spells. Arrange spirits into special patterns to unlock potent powers!
  • Bond with a cast of witches and demons. Plan a pizza party together, crash a concert, maybe even smooch!
  • Decorate your bedroom. Earn trinkets and keepsakes as you play, then place them in Samar’s room to affect gameplay.
  • Compete in local VS mode! Everything is chill, until it gets permanently unchill....
  • Enjoy over 5 unique game modes, including Time Attack, Score Attack, and Survival.





Samar is a young witch working the spirit-swapping night shift in the eastern outskirts of Demashq. A recent spike in spirits crossing over from another dimension breaks the chill atmosphere of their night shift. With her trusty familiarZ by her side, she sets off into the city to find out what’s happened. data.short_description: Cast spells, be queer, & crash the biggest concert of the year! Spirit Swap is an action-puzzle game set in a lush, narrative-driven world of witchy demons.
data.reviews:
“...the game has managed to take my love for puzzle games and turn them into something magically creative. And gay. Very, very gay.”
The Mary Sue

“Spirit Swap juxtaposes the relaxation we associate with lo-fi music with a demanding competitive streak.”
Fanbyte

“Spirit Swap looks to be giving the match-three genre a much-needed fresh lick of paint.”
PC Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
